item.title: The Fallout 4 That Could Have Been
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: It's not the classic music or the quirky fifties costumes that make Fallout so memorable.

item.title: Remember the Time
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: Something strange hit me... I don't know you anymore.

item.title: The Zeta Directive
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: The truth was out there, right in front of her eyes.

item.title: The Zeta Directive [Section 2]
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: A diplomat's daughter is entangled in an international conspiracy that runs lightyears deeper than she ever could have imagined.

item.title: The Zeta Directive [Section 3]
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: The crackle of metal being sliced open with superheated plasma was audible even from the other side of the airlock door, followed by a loud metallic clatter and then silence.

item.title: The Zeta Directive [Section 4]
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: Neon gridden lines converged from the periphery of Fiir's vision, creating a wireframe rendition of the room that she occupied....

item.title: The Zeta Directive [Section 5]
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: Colossal ivory-white high-rise towers sprawled in all directions, glistening in the sunlight as a monument to a breathtaking antediluvian metropolis.

item.title: The Zeta Directive [Section 10]
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: Josh panned and zoomed the camera to get a better look at the ominous disk-shaped vessel. Smoke billowed from the craft, obscuring it near completely on the optical spectrum...

item.title: The Zeta Directive [Section 6]
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: Fiir's confrontation with the Terran girl had left her with much to think about. The young primate was both a curiosity and a complication. A deeply frustrating one, at that.

item.title: Close Encounters
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: It was a maze of tunnels and hallways down here, dimly lit and dread-inducing. The flashlight attachment on my rifle was my one light in the darkness...

item.title: Alaja Writing: A Linguistic Overview
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: A discussion of the writing system used in "lekis kojfo", a fictional language spoken in the scifi universe of The Zeta Directive.

item.title: The Zeta Directive [Section 7]
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: The bridge of the ship felt more like a space-age information bunker than a control centre for piloting a cutting-edge starship...

item.title: The Zeta Directive [Section 8]
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: In time, her broken heart would heal stronger than it had ever been before, readjusting to her newfound reality.

item.title: The Zeta Directive [Section 9][Interlude]
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: Sometimes she liked to think about who might have lived in all these old buildings that the Peacekeepers ordered them to tear apart. The empty towering ivory skyscrapers had a heavenly radiance to them in the brilliant white light of the Kojfo sun.

item.title: Copyright: The Death of Tomorrow
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: We can come together to build a better world for the artists and historians of tomorrow by protecting their right to do what they can with the ideas we create today.

item.title: The Zeta Directive [Section 11]
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: Josh gritted his teeth. "Fuck you, ma'am."

item.title: The Dreamer
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: A shining star in the darkness, some glimpses of the light are lost into eternity, only to be known by the gods themselves...

item.title: A New Neosynth
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: What's old is new again: the story of the Neosynth site redesign

item.title: The Veiled Maiden
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: She smiled back to me supportively with an enthusiastic pearlescent glow in her captivating cerulean eyes. "Prithee, it lights my soul to see your invention shapen before me, my lady."

item.title: The Digital Citizen
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: The digital revolution and its consequences have been a kind of new enlightenment for human society.

item.title: The Zeta Directive [Section 12]
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: Josh took his face into his hands and wept. Earth was still ruled by those slimy alien bastards, and no one would ever even *believe* him, much less do anything about it.

item.title: Spin the Record
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: Call me DJ. The full name's kind of a mouthful.

item.title: Vox PÃ¦nitentia
item.dc:creator: Neon
item.description: The cutting-edge industrialists of today had departed, entrusting the world of tomorrow to the skeletons left in their closet.
